ticket.original-body:
Hello all, I am working on the ruby on rails tutorial Learn Rails by Example by Michael Hartl. I installed ruby with RVM per the instructions and I am receiving errors. The last step for installation verification was verifying the version of rails. Searching through google has not produced any results. I need your help. Mac - Leopard RVM Rails 3.0.4 Ruby 1.9.2-p136
